entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023
